app.description: Agents from the Finance group will be able to review a batch of customer claims that have been identified by agents and managers for refund processing. If a batch has been approved by the Finance group, it will be sent to the HyperWallet API for processing and payment. Additionally, an approved batch will generate a CSV file that will be downloaded to the agentâ€™s workstation. If a claim in a batch needs correction, Porter agents will have to manually modify the tickets to exclude them from the batch results.
app.name: Finance - Claim Manager
